response.explain: The previous action code successfully moved the robot to the bottom cabinet without any errors. The next step is to open the bottom cabinet to access the tortilla.
response.subtask:
(1) Move to the bottom cabinet.
(2) Open the bottom cabinet.
(3) Take out the tortilla from the bottom cabinet.
(4) Move to the stove.
(5) Heat the tortilla on the stove.
response.code:
